name: Wood you mind?
description:
#hüttenjam, topic: "Can't see the wood for the trees"

You play as powerful Ricardo. Others think you simply want to be photographed. But you know that you just NEED to make the smombies enjoy the view, not their photographs. And if that means you have to spoil enhance their photos with you godlike body, so be it.

Special thanks to:

  • Ricardo Milos, for inspiration
  • Die Woody's, for their Fichtl song
